sourcesContent:
export default {
  name: "Woo Young Choi",
  contact: {
    links: [
      ["wooyoungchoi.dev", "//wooyoungchoi.dev"],
      ["wychoi356@gmail.com", "mailto:wychoi356@gmail.com"],
      ["linkedin.com/in/woo-young", "//linkedin.com/in/woo-young/"],
      ["github.com/wc356", "//github.com/wc356"],
    ],
    notLinks: ["201 820 7277"],
  },
  education: {
    school: "Cornell University,",
    location: "Ithaca NY",
    subTitle:
      "Bachelor of Science in Landscape Architecture August 2014 - May 2018",
    description: [
      "Design Team at United Nations Association of Cornell University",
      "Volunteer at Friends of Tiger Glen Garden",
    ],
  },
  experience: {
    professional: [
      {
        title: "Project Lead Frontend DeveloperWAY",
        location: "Remote",
        subTitle: "May 2020 - Present",
        description: [
          "Responsible for architecting, styling, and coordinating Merchant Portal of online payment platform for small businesses of Ithaca, NY via—React, TypeScript, Python, Dart SASS, Redux, Figma, and Git",
          "• Briefing company teams, and leadership at biweekly meetings to discuss team's progress, goals, set-backs, deadlines, and accessibility best practices for Merchant Portal of Web Development",
          "• Set up initial Typescript/ React / Redux Merchant Portal SPA utilizing backend's Python API endpoints to sort, and analyze Sales Summary and Transactions",
          "• Crafted Redux store to capture Merchant Orders from backened APIs as async JSON objects to render, and filter visible Merchant Orders data by date, and order numbers",
          "• Styled and utilized responsive, reusable components—Navbar, Sidebar, Merchant Forms, Form Headers—and reusable functions to render rows of Merchant's order data, and convert currency data into formatted code",
          "• Conducted code reviews of team code for suggestions, efficiencies, and optimizations. Responsible for answering team's questions for project or features implementations.",
        ],
        link: ["see Github", "URL here"],
      },
      {
        title: "Frontend Developer",
        location: "Remote",
        subTitle: "May 2020 - Present",
        description: [
          "Responsible for architecting, styling, and coordinating Merchant Portal of online payment platform for small businesses of Ithaca, NY via—React, TypeScript, Python, Dart SASS, Redux, Figma, and Git",
          "• Briefing company teams, and leadership at biweekly meetings to discuss team's progress, goals, set-backs, deadlines, and accessibility best practices for Merchant Portal of Web Development",
          "• Set up initial Typescript/ React / Redux Merchant Portal SPA utilizing backend's Python API endpoints to sort, and analyze Sales Summary and Transactions",
          "• Crafted Redux store to capture Merchant Orders from backened APIs as async JSON objects to render, and filter visible Merchant Orders data by date, and order numbers",
          "• Styled and utilized responsive, reusable components—Navbar, Sidebar, Merchant Forms, Form Headers—and reusable functions to render rows of Merchant's order data, and convert currency data into formatted code",
          "• Conducted code reviews of team code for suggestions, efficiencies, and optimizations. Responsible for answering team's questions for project or features implementations.",
        ],
        link: ["see Github", "URL here"],
      },
    ],
    project: [
      {
        title: "Web-Portfolio",
        location: "",
        subTitle: "",
        description: [
          "ReactJS, NextJS, JavaScript, styled-jsx, responsive-design, dynamic pages | routing, SCSS | SASS, Adobe XD | prototyping, Git",
          "Front-end dynamic website with dynamically rendered content to serve as a personal website",
        ],
        link: ["see Github", "//github.com/wc356/portfolio-website"],
      },
      {
        title: "Expensify",
        location: "",
        subTitle: "",
        description: [
          "ReactJS, Redux, JavaScript, react-router, webpack, Babel, Jest, Enzyme, Firebase, Heroku, SCSS | SASS, authorization, Git",
          "Full-stack web application for storing and managing expenses—sort by date range, amount and filter through keywords",
        ],
        link: ["see Github", "//github.com/wc356/react-expensify"],
      },
      {
        title: "Specula",
        location: "",
        subTitle: "",
        description: [
          "ReactJS, NextJS, JavaScript styled-jsx, Context API, SSR/CSR Dynamic Pages and Routing, React Hooks, Local Storage, Git",
          "Front-end web application for quickly comparing cellular phones—sort by release date, price, brand and filter using keywords",
        ],
        link: ["see Github", "//github.com/wc356/specula-v2"],
      },
    ],
  },
  technology: [
    "JavaScript",
    "TypeScript",
    "React",
    "Redux",
    "MongoDB",
    "SASS",
    "Vim",
    "Git",
    "Adobe XD",
    "Photoshop",
    "Indesign",
    "Illustrator",
  ],
  honors: {
    title: "Cornell CALS Dean's List - 4 Semesters",
    description: "Fall 2016, Spring 2016, Fall 2017, Spring 2018",
  },
  languages: ["English - Fluent", "Korean - Native"],
  interests: ["Full-stack Development", "UI/UX & Design"],
  hobbies: [
    "New coding languages",
    "Side Projects",
    "Reading",
    "Playing Guitar",
  ],
  colors: {
    highlight: "#561eff",
    title: "black",
    body: "#444",
    border: "#d8d5f7",
    shadow: "#d8d5f7",
  },
  download: ["Download", "/images/Choi_resume.pdf"],
};
